messages.content:
***Device***
Name: Right Hue Color XY
ID: ZB24569_011_108
  ***Properties***
    Color X
      Range 0.0 to 1.0 Unit Color (step of 1.0 and precision of 5).
    Color Y
      Range 0.0 to 1.0 Unit Color (step of 1.0 and precision of 5).
    Color Temperature K
      Range 0 to 1 Unit Kelvin (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Color Temperature Mired
      Range 0 to 1 Unit Mired (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Preferred Units
      Enum
        Kelvin [0]
        Mired [1]
  ***Accept Commands***
    Move To Temperature [MOVETOCT]
        Parameter 1: Color [COLOR]
          Range 2000 to 6535 Unit Kelvin (step of 1 and precision of 1).
        Parameter 2: Duration [DUR]
          Range 0.0 to 6553.0 Unit seconds (step of 1.0 and precision of 1).
    Preferred Units [UNITS]
        Parameter 1:  []
          Enum
            Kelvin [0]
            Mired [1]
How do I change the color temperature to 4000 Kelvin?
Use the `Move To Temperature [MOVETOCT]` command with parameter `Color` set to 4000 and `Duration` set to your desired transition time (e.g., 0.0 seconds).

***Device***
Name: Right Hue Color XY
ID: ZB24569_011_108
  ***Properties***
    Color X
      Range 0.0 to 1.0 Unit Color (step of 1.0 and precision of 5).
    Color Y
      Range 0.0 to 1.0 Unit Color (step of 1.0 and precision of 5).
    Color Temperature K
      Range 0 to 1 Unit Kelvin (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Color Temperature Mired
      Range 0 to 1 Unit Mired (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Preferred Units
      Enum
        Kelvin [0]
        Mired [1]
  ***Accept Commands***
    Move To Temperature [MOVETOCT]
        Parameter 1: Color [COLOR]
          Range 2000 to 6535 Unit Kelvin (step of 1 and precision of 1).
        Parameter 2: Duration [DUR]
          Range 0.0 to 6553.0 Unit seconds (step of 1.0 and precision of 1).
    Preferred Units [UNITS]
        Parameter 1:  []
          Enum
            Kelvin [0]
            Mired [1]
What units can I use for color temperature?
You can choose between Kelvin [0] and Mired [1]. These units are defined under the `Preferred Units` property and command.

***Device***
Name: Right Hue Color XY
ID: ZB24569_011_108
  ***Properties***
    Color X
      Range 0.0 to 1.0 Unit Color (step of 1.0 and precision of 5).
    Color Y
      Range 0.0 to 1.0 Unit Color (step of 1.0 and precision of 5).
    Color Temperature K
      Range 0 to 1 Unit Kelvin (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Color Temperature Mired
      Range 0 to 1 Unit Mired (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Preferred Units
      Enum
        Kelvin [0]
        Mired [1]
  ***Accept Commands***
    Move To Temperature [MOVETOCT]
        Parameter 1: Color [COLOR]
          Range 2000 to 6535 Unit Kelvin (step of 1 and precision of 1).
        Parameter 2: Duration [DUR]
          Range 0.0 to 6553.0 Unit seconds (step of 1.0 and precision of 1).
    Preferred Units [UNITS]
        Parameter 1:  []
          Enum
            Kelvin [0]
            Mired [1]
What's the valid range for the Color parameter in Move To Temperature?
The `Color` parameter accepts values between 2000 and 6535 in Kelvin.

***Device***
Name: Right Hue Color XY
ID: ZB24569_011_108
  ***Properties***
    Color X
      Range 0.0 to 1.0 Unit Color (step of 1.0 and precision of 5).
    Color Y
      Range 0.0 to 1.0 Unit Color (step of 1.0 and precision of 5).
    Color Temperature K
      Range 0 to 1 Unit Kelvin (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Color Temperature Mired
      Range 0 to 1 Unit Mired (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Preferred Units
      Enum
        Kelvin [0]
        Mired [1]
  ***Accept Commands***
    Move To Temperature [MOVETOCT]
        Parameter 1: Color [COLOR]
          Range 2000 to 6535 Unit Kelvin (step of 1 and precision of 1).
        Parameter 2: Duration [DUR]
          Range 0.0 to 6553.0 Unit seconds (step of 1.0 and precision of 1).
    Preferred Units [UNITS]
        Parameter 1:  []
          Enum
            Kelvin [0]
            Mired [1]
What does the `Duration` parameter do in Move To Temperature?
The `Duration` parameter sets the transition time for the color temperature change. It ranges from 0.0 to 6553.0 seconds.

***Device***
Name: Right Hue Color XY
ID: ZB24569_011_108
  ***Properties***
    Color X
      Range 0.0 to 1.0 Unit Color (step of 1.0 and precision of 5).
    Color Y
      Range 0.0 to 1.0 Unit Color (step of 1.0 and precision of 5).
    Color Temperature K

    Move To Temperature [MOVETOCT]
        Parameter 1: Color [COLOR]
          Range 2000 to 6535 Unit Kelvin (step of 1 and precision of 1).
        Parameter 2: Duration [DUR]
          Range 0.0 to 6553.0 Unit seconds (step of 1.0 and precision of 1).
    Preferred Units [UNITS]
        Parameter 1:  []

            Mired [1]
Can I use Mired instead of Kelvin?
Yes, Mired is a supported unit in the `Preferred Units` property and command.
